post.body: You always look on the bright side... big hugs, sweetie : )
What if I hold my breath till I turn blue?
What's not to love about Colorado?
Dear Gods of Lotto, please let Tracy win the big one : )
Baby... oops that wasn't meant for you! I meant to tell you I'm having trouble accepting your Facebook request! Is the site down?
@vojha How close are you to Charlotte or Raleigh?
How close are you to Charlotte or Raleigh?
Yeah, mine in at 1840. Crazy. Being a WH member is supposed to give you certain advantages...
If they don't, there's always next year.
Eh, I've already seen them a good amount of times to be happy. If they come thru Colorado in the summer, I'll go.
Prolly neither. 7 hrs to Albuq. 13 hr to AZ. My daughter used to live in Phoenix, so I used to combine a trip to see her & DMB.
Say what?
Which one is closer to where you are? I think they're both really good. Haven't been back in a couple years though.Sooo jealous!
No one deserves to be less than three'd more than you : )
Aw, sweet. I <3 you.
I've been there!
I could do those. I could also work in a garden shop or a bookstore & not be stressed. DMB tour chef. I can think of lots of them.
Professional Twitterer? That wouldn't be stressful. Pro baby-cheek pincher. Ice-cream taster. Shoe shopper. How about those jobs?
So they think that if they give you a paycheck, they have to suck your soul dry in the process???
Have a nice holiday, Jillian : )
@tarbox27 Tee hee... teabag..
http://twitpic.com/vopg - Oh, my. Looks like you're going camping.
Hi, Renee!
Slacker LOL
Takes one to know one ; ) xoxo
Traveling the world & experiencing other cultures? Yeah... totally looney... & if it is, I don't want to be sane ; )
That quote was for you : ) Sounds like she's a beautiful friend.
What did you get?
Finally worked. Facebook can be such a poop.
Or it could be my piece of crap 4 year old Dell laptop : )
You east coasters are lucky! You have lots of choices in a few hours drive : )
Off to trek home on icy roads. Later, twits : )
No spring dates for me.
Wow... they really did open WH ticket ordering... what happened to the email?!
Although Phoenix in May is better than Phoenix in August.
Yeah... no Colorado dates in the spring...
Is there a law somewhere that requires your work to be stressful? I mean REALLY???
From the Bhagavad Gita : )
A gift is pure when itâ€™s given from the heart to the right person at the right time & at the right place & when we expect nothing in return-
I'm wearing an itchy sweater today. When will I learn that I can't wear wool???
